title: arsenprog
author: arsenprog
content: We are a company engaged in the recovery of wallets out of 183 wallets, we managed to restore 76. We do not count fake wallets, because immediately after checking, we answer a fake client!Checking for falsity, we check timesmart for the number and also check the number of transactions!Our recovery conditions for each are universal for wallet recovery, it all depends on the complexity of the password and the number of restored btc!Here are the powers we have.https://ibb.co/wcvBcn2Also, we do not share or sell your wallets, privacy is the key to our success!The software was written by ourselves C++ CUDAtelegram: https://t.me/arsenprogWe are waiting for your suggestions!

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: What does the software check for while looking at the wallet.dat file to identify the fakeness ?

comments.author: arsenprog
comments.body: Quote from: CCMS on November 30, 2022, 02:56:54 PMWhat does the software check for while looking at the wallet.dat file to identify the fakeness ?timesmart to transaction
